item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. DeepMind releases Lyria 2 music generation model (91 points | 68 comments)

14. You Can Be a Great Designer and Be Completely Unknown (130 points | 56 comments)

24. Fundamental flaws of SIMD ISAs (2021) (111 points | 79 comments)

26. Henry James was not at home in America (5 points | 1 comment)
27. Microsoft subtracts C/C++ extension from VS Code forks (132 points | 130 comments)
28. Bild AI (YC W25) is hiring a founding engineer in SF ( | hide)
29. There's a Seeker Born Every Minute (12 points | 7 comments)
